statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{17 \, x^{2} + 22 , -2 \, x^{3} - x^{2} - 4 \, x - 6 , -2 \, x^{3} + 9 \, x^{2} - 11 \, x + 1 , 4 \, x^{3} + 5 \, x^{2} - 6 \, x + 4 , -4 \, x^{3} + 5 \, x^{2} - x + 3\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
